title: Fully updated,2 Bed/2 Bath+ new furnace and AC, #@
posting_body: Fully updated, spacious oak park ranch!
The home has many new updates- stained kitchen cabinets, granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, ample closet space, brand new furnace and AC, fully fenced yard, and more!
Situated in a quiet neighborhood 5 minutes from downtown Royal Oak and Ferndale, this home is available for immediate occupancy.
